task.summary: Default task
REGEX/Scanning complete. Now times out and prints the discovered devices
Trimming the fat
Setting up the XML parsing, added a service class.
Setting up the XML parsing, added a service class.
Setting up the XML parsing, added a service class.
XML can now get XML documents remotely and parse them as a string
Working on error correction and outlying values
Working on output format
Adding timeout to the sock connection, correcting variables
Adding more formatting, cleaning up the code a bit
Object restructuring, putting URL information into the device/services for later use to spider the actions, or if you want to go back to saved objects in the future.
General code cleanup and renaming

Picking up and downloading the Actions page off services.
Additional code formatting.
Big changes to the output to make it more readable!
Renaming functions, some code formatting, variable casting and some output cleanup.
Adding argument control for help, verbosity, ip and port.
Slight changes in terminal output
Slight changes in terminal output... again
Fixed the terminal "wrapping" glitch and got variables/default values fetched/printing. Also, managed to format the output to keep everything a bit more "aligned"
Merging and slight change!
Adding curses as output method
Beginning restructure for terminal application.

Menu is now in development! Has a loading bar when a scan starts that will stop when scan is finished. New devices are added to the menu, next stage is making it interactive and dealing with over 9 devices (can't press 10 instantly!)
Starting interaction stage
Added submenu, need to change printouts to work with curse
Further submenu optimizations.
Submenu optimisations, device info can now be printed and services searched/recorded. Next step will be printing actions or searching them for more information.
Created service menu (currently only prints simple info, but need to work on more than <X> entries into service list and printing/scanning of actions

Started importing vas's exploit (converting it to python3 from python2, and making it callable from the main application). Also started cleanup in occordance to PEP8.
In terms of FEATURES, started creation of a generic UPnP message sender. Hopefully this should allow us to start vulnerability scans at some point.

Started importing vas's exploit (converting it to python3 from python2, and making it callable from the main application). Also started cleanup in occordance to PEP8.
In terms of FEATURES, started creation of a generic UPnP message sender. Hopefully this should allow us to start vulnerability scans at some point.
The beginning of "THE BIG RESTRUCTURING".
continuing changes, probably broken atm!
Got the thread to return a value by using a "proxy" function.
Finally got rid of BColors! Also wrapping up the restructuring of the application, although it needs testing again...
Starting up risk assessment for actions and services.
Finishing up the big restructure, new feature of a "scrollable" window based off of a string input, need to add it to the required areas.

MESSAGE.value:
Picking up and downloading the Actions page off services.
Additional code formatting.
Big changes to the output to make it more readable!
Renaming functions, some code formatting, variable casting and some output cleanup.
Adding argument control for help, verbosity, ip and port.
Slight changes in terminal output
Slight changes in terminal output... again
Fixed the terminal "wrapping" glitch and got variables/default values fetched/printing. Also, managed to format the output to keep everything a bit more "aligned"
Merging and slight change!
Adding curses as output method
Beginning restructure for terminal application.

Menu is now in development! Has a loading bar when a scan starts that will stop when scan is finished. New devices are added to the menu, next stage is making it interactive and dealing with over 9 devices (can't press 10 instantly!)
Starting interaction stage
Added submenu, need to change printouts to work with curse
Further submenu optimizations.
Submenu optimisations, device info can now be printed and services searched/recorded. Next step will be printing actions or searching them for more information.
Created service menu (currently only prints simple info, but need to work on more than <X> entries into service list and printing/scanning of actions

Started importing vas's exploit (converting it to python3 from python2, and making it callable from the main application). Also started cleanup in occordance to PEP8.
In terms of FEATURES, started creation of a generic UPnP message sender. Hopefully this should allow us to start vulnerability scans at some point.
Re-ordering the XML reader, slight updates to the generic SOAP request module.
THE BIG RESTRUCTURE
The beginning of "THE BIG RESTRUCTURING".
continuing changes, probably broken atm!
Got the thread to return a value by using a "proxy" function.
Finally got rid of BColors! Also wrapping up the restructuring of the application, although it needs testing again...
Starting up risk assessment for actions and services.
Finishing up the big restructure, new feature of a "scrollable" window based off of a string input, need to add it to the required areas.
